hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #a Map of the Water Temple#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #Skulls#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Skulltula#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Prelude of Light#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

SFM (Saria).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Heart Piece Room

ZF (Fairy).text: Long time watcher, first time player. Greetings from Termina. Incentive goes to Randobot's choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly Small Wooden Crate 2

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
